messages.subject: Your-a email
messages.body:
Hallo Mr. John, it's me, Luigi ! Luigi Mario !

I got your-a email that starta with...

"I am Dr. Eze John an ex-executive staff of the Mobil Oil Nigeria
Limited, I got your contact from a business Directory. I seek your
assistance to transfer $14.3million Dollars into a foreign Account."

I do not-a unnerstand why you contact-a a plumbery about-a Soudafrica
and eloctrimachenical, or millionsadollars. I am justa plumbar. I work-
a on pipes.

Do you have some-a kind ouv plumbery work for us ? If youa wanna to
talk to my brother, Mario, de owner-a, he is-a not in rightanow... He
isa at "Koopa Resort", and I donno when he coma back-a. Not in a long-a
while, probabile.

So pleasse explain-a what this is allabout, capiche ?

-- 
Mario Mario and Luigi Mario
Mario Brothers Plumbery Inc.
3 Paper Av., Toadstool
Nintendo Island

I unnderstand-a content. I donot know about-a millionsadollars. I am a
plumbar. I work-a on PIPES not dollars. But I askdya to email-a back,
to tell-a me morre.

Youa need to shed-a some light on da modalites, capiche ?

My brother, Mario, isa at "Koopa Resort". He wonna be back for a long-a
time, probabile. I am ina charge-a of de finences. But I need-a
modalites.

-- 
Mario Mario and Luigi Mario
Mario Brothers Plumbery Inc.
3 Paper Av., Toadstool
Nintendo Island

messages.body:
Received: from 


Dear Luigi Mario,

Thanks for your mail and for your willingness to assist me with this
transaction.

Like I explained ealier, My friend, Mr. Obi was the one who deposited
the consignment on my behalf and gave me the confirmation of th trunk,
right now as i am writing you I have with me all the necessary document
regarding this transaction so I am sure of 100% hitch and riskfree in
this transaction.

I need you to assist me in going to the security company to collect the
consignment on my behalf with the necessary document that will enable
you make the claim.

What I need from you to proceed is your personal details such as your
name in full, contact address, age, occupation, telephone and fax
numbers for easy communication, as soon as I received these information
from you I will then secure an AFFIDAVIT on your behalf sent to you and
the CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT for the consignment that will enable you
make the claim on my behalf.

Thereafter I will give you the contact of the security company to
contact them for more clearification on how to come.

I will be waiting for your urgent response to this mail.

Thanks and God bless,

Regards,

Dr. Eze John.

DR EZE JOHN (dr.ezejohn@koko.com)

I need you to assist me in going to the security company to collect the consignment on my behalf with the necessary document that will enable you make the claim.

What I need from you to proceed is your personal details such as your name in full, contact address, age, occupation, telephone and fax numbers for easy communication, as soon as I received these information from you I will then secure an AFFIDAVIT on your behalf sent to you and the CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT for the consignment that will enable you make the claim on my behalf.

Thereafter I will give you the contact of the security company to contact them for more clearification on how to come.

I will be waiting for your urgent response to this mail.

Thanks and God bless,

Dr. Eze John.

messages.subject: De informatione you request-a
messages.body:
Gratias for your-a explanation, but stilla no modalites. I am sure-a
you will-a get to it when-a necessare.

I do nota unnerstand dis "consignment" and why you need-a plumbar to
get moneys ? It isa misterri.

Here isa the informatione you request-a :

NAME : LUIGI MARIO
CONTACT ADDRESS : It isa in signatoure. That isa address of plumbery.
AGE : 35
OCCUPATION : Plumbar
TELEPHONE : This isa NINTENDO ISLAND. We do nota have phone-a lines to
the mainaland. We have-a remote internat, mail, buta no phone.
FAX : We use-a online fax service-a from America. De numbar is 709 238
5473. Sometimes ita works, sometimes-a not works.

I hada rough-a day. There-a was a leek on a waterapipe becausav three
goombas I had to fight-a off. You probabily do nota know GOOMBAS. They
ara indiganeus to Nintendo-a Island. They-a look lika gopher, but
vicious creaturre. Thatisa what it isa to live on sucha desolate place-
a, Mr. John. But witha mushroom to give-a me strength, those-a goombas
arenota so tough !

Tell-a me Mr. John, do you evar partake-a ov the good-a mushroom ? Me
and my brotha find-a very helpful to get the energy to deal-a with
pests. Ita seems to give us some-a... howa do you say... statoure.

Your-a name is dimly familiar, yea ? Do you nota have a cousin-a
named "Papa" ?

I will-a wait for your clareficiction anda contact, anda "AFFIDAVIT"
anda "CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT".

They-a look lika gopher, but vicious creaturre. Thatisa what it isa to live on sucha desolate place- a, Mr. John. But witha mushroom to give-a me strength, those-a goombas arenota so tough !

I will-a wait for your clareficiction anda contact, anda "AFFIDAVIT" anda "CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT".

messages.subject: Waiting for your urgent reply
messages.body:
Dear Luigi Mario,

How are you today? I recieved your mail and the informations well noted.

The consignment I am talking about is my money in a box deposited by my
partner Mr. Obi. You are to tell me when you will be ready to go to the
security company in Europe (Switzerland) for the collection of the
consignment.

This is the telephone number of the security offical to be contacted:
41-795326190 his name is Anthony Oxby, please contact him for more
clearification on how to claim this fund.


Note: this has to be kept within your self until the money is out and I
will send you by attachment those documents that will enable claim the
fund on my behalf. Since you dont have phone, can I give you my number
so you can call me? let me know in your reply so that we can discuss
more and familiarise ourselves.

Luigi, you have to take this transaction serius because this is not a
child's play as this will make both of us rich.

Thanks and God Bless,

Waiting to hear from you.

Regards,

Dr. Eze John.
messages.raw:
DR EZE JOHN (dr.ezejohn@koko.com)

Date: 8/6/2003 20:36:09 +0100
Subject: Waiting for your urgent reply

Dear Luigi Mario,

How are you today? I recieved your mail and the informations well noted.

The consignment I am talking about is my money in a box deposited by my partner Mr. Obi. You are to tell me when you will be ready to go to the security company in Europe (Switzerland) for the collection of the consignment.

This is the telephone number of the security offical to be contacted: 41-795326190 his name is Anthony Oxby, please contact him for more clearification on how to claim this fund.

["Anthony Oxby" is the same Lad whom Dr Eze John wanted Gimli to contact, but he never managed to get the dimwitted and stubborn Gimli to follow through.]

Note: this has to be kept within your self until the money is out and I will send you by attachment those documents that will enable claim the fund on my behalf. Since you dont have phone, can I give you my number so you can call me? let me know in your reply so that we can discuss more and familiarise ourselves.

Luigi, you have to take this transaction serius because this is not a child's play as this will make both of us rich.

Thanks and God Bless,

Waiting to hear from you.

Regards,

Dr. Eze John.

messages.body:
It isa good to hear-a from you. Letsa just say that-a being a star here
isa nice, but annoying-a somatimes. You know, it isa nice to talk toa
someone with whom-a I can just-a shoota de breeze.

So I will have-a to go to Swazerland ? That isa far away ! Expensive !
But-a I heard they make-a nice cheese-a, and watch, anda bank. Well, I
cannat travel righta now, I ama busy. It isa big goomba migartion right-
a now. My brother Mario isanot here-a to take-a care of de bisness
while-a I am away. He will-a come back maybe next-a week, then-a we can
talkabout it.

I can nota wait-a to show my brother whata we are-a doing ! Everyone-a
think I ama the assistant brother, that-a I ama second playar. That
will-a show him up a-fter all.

I dunnot-a know why you give-a me a phone numbar "41-795326190" (whatta
jumbele). Unless your-a offical isa on Nintendo Island, I cannot-a call
him. We do nota have LONG-DISTANCA LINES.

Finences are-a not child ploy, I a-gree ! Talkinga-bout child ploy, are-
a you a famely man, Mr. John ? You still-a did not answer me about a
Papa in your-a famely ? I have-a niece called MIA. She lives ina Japan
with her famely. I have-a lived ina Japan for more than-a ten years, it
isa where we became-a popular. They know-a us there as "Super" !

Mia isa nice gurl. They come-a here sometime, anda she say "when-a
grown up, I swim-a to here !". Then I say-a, "silly chile ! you will-a
drown !". Silly chile. But she isa the best.

Take-a it eze.
messages.raw:

So I will have-a to go to Swazerland ? That isa far away ! Expensive ! But-a I heard they make-a nice cheese-a, and watch, anda bank. Well, I cannat travel righta now, I ama busy. It isa big goomba migartion right- a now. My brother Mario isanot here-a to take-a care of de bisness while-a I am away. He will-a come back maybe next-a week, then-a we can talkabout it.

I can nota wait-a to show my brother whata we are-a doing ! Everyone-a think I ama the assistant brother, that-a I ama second playar. That will-a show him up a-fter all.

I dunnot-a know why you give-a me a phone numbar "41-795326190" (whatta jumbele). Unless your-a offical isa on Nintendo Island, I cannot-a call him. We do nota have LONG-DISTANCA LINES.

Finences are-a not child ploy, I a-gree ! Talkinga-bout child ploy, are- a you a famely man, Mr. John ? You still-a did not answer me about a Papa in your-a famely ? I have-a niece called MIA. She lives ina Japan with her famely. I have-a lived ina Japan for more than-a ten years, it isa where we became-a popular. They know-a us there as "Super" !

Mia isa nice gurl. They come-a here sometime, anda she say "when-a grown up, I swim-a to here !". Then I say-a, "silly chile ! you will-a drown !". Silly chile. But she isa the best.

Take-a it eze.

messages.body:
Received: from 


Dear Luigi,

Thanks for your urgent response, I understood your plight but you have to contact the security company first, since you can not call, I think email will be better for you so that you can write them to know if they can ship the consignment through courier servise to you.

Luigi, can you send like $200 to me so that I can send the documents live by DHL to you for you to have the original copy, please tell me?.

I dont have any body called papa, you said you have a family in japan? that is very nice, japan is a good place and I believe I will know your family after this transaction.

Thanks for your cooperation and God bless.

waiting, Regards,

Dr. Eze John.

messages.subject: Mamma-mia !
messages.body:
MAMMA-MIA ! Millions ? Are-a you sure ? This isa quite the unexpected.

Perhaps it would-a be good to involve-a the royal famely fora
transarction of this magnetide. I have-a talked to de Princess of
Toadstool today and she was-a interested to help your-a plight. Please-
a do not be concerned about-a confidentiale, they are-a royal famely
after all. They have-a the power to help-a you.

I will tell-a the Princess to email-a you. Maybe she-a will, maybe she-
a not. Her real-a name is Penny Century. She is-a very regal and
admired. She helps-a chiles.

We tend-a to eat musharoomsa raw or cooked, but-a soup isa good too.
Nota onion-a soup though, it cuts-a de flavour. I learn-a that from
expirience.

Before I email-a "security company", should you not-a send me documents
I need ? Like AFFIDAVIT anda CERTIFICATE OF DECREPIT ? Please-a come
back toa me on dis as soon asa possibele.
messages.raw:
LUIGI MARIO

Date: 8/7/2003 15:01:29 -0500
Subject: Mamma-mia !

Please- a do not be concerned about-a confidentiale, they are-a royal famely after all. They have-a the power to help-a you.

I will tell-a the Princess to email-a you. Maybe she-a will, maybe she- a not. Her real-a name is Penny Century. She is-a very regal and admired. She helps-a chiles.

We tend-a to eat musharoomsa raw or cooked, but-a soup isa good too. Nota onion-a soup though, it cuts-a de flavour. I learn-a that from expirience.

Before I email-a "security company", should you not-a send me documents I need ? Like AFFIDAVIT anda CERTIFICATE OF DECREPIT ? Please-a come back toa me on dis as soon asa possibele.

messages.body:
Received: from  


Dear Luigi Mario,

I am happy for your mail, this is real and I pray God for things to work out fine for us, our life will change.

Please note that this is my life time opportunity and a time for your life to change, I do not want a situation whereby this money will go to a wrong hand, that to say, you should know the cain of poeple you talk to about this transaction for your security reasons bacause you don't know your enemy.

Ok, I will see what I can do today, so that by monday next week I will send to you these documents.

Meanwhile, you should be looking for an investment that is good in your area for me because after you collect this money I will like to come over to your country for investment please.

Please don't tell any other person eccecpt the princess, greet the princess for me, I pray I will see her one day.

Thanks and God bless you.

Hope to hear from you.

Dr.Eze John.

messages.subject: Investamintes
messages.body:
Hello Mr. John ! I ama glad you-a feel confident about this-a
transaction. I hope youa have a good-a weekends.

I can nota tell you how incredabile this all-a is. My brother Mario
will-a surely be surprised to learn-a what I havea been doing. Like I
said, I havea always been-a considered de "second player" ova the two
of us. Now that I can-a bring such prosparity to Nintendo Island, I
will-a be pupular also.

I do nota know why you-a would come here for investamintes. Nintendo
Island isa very small. We do not have-a much investamintes. Obviousely,
musharooms are-a good market, yea, for-a export. Also, other indiganeus
things-a like fire flowar, and the high-a qualitie Kuribo shoes.
Kuribo's have-a been making air shoes long-a before Nike !

Please-a make no worrie about-a de princess. As royaltie, she isa
reliable. She would-a not risk anything that-a would hurt reputettion,
you know howa it is.

-- 
Mario Mario and Luigi Mario
Mario Brothers Plumbery Inc.
3 Paper Av., Toadstool
Nintendo Island

Also, other indiganeus things-a like fire flowar, and the high-a qualitie Kuribo shoes. Kuribo's have-a been making air shoes long-a before Nike !

messages.subject: Money Laundroment
messages.body:
CC: marioplumber

To: Il Dottore Eze John

Regarding: Money Laundroment

I am still to not be the understand. I was of the idea I was to be
helping of the childrens. Now you are saying you are to be giving me
the moneys? And then you say you are in Switzerland? I am an
educationed bambina, Dottore. I am know that the children in
Switzerland are to be white and fat, and eat of the chocolate. Their
clothes are surely stained with the chocolate, but their very rich
parents own their own laundroments, as they are to be making fashion
watches and yodel records. You see? I am a funny!

I am still the interested in doing the business if it is of benefit to
my peoples. Please to send me your picture so I may determine your
trustworthiness. I know my faces, Dottore. I can see the deceit in the
eyes. I am have been educated in philonomy, the extensive study of
facial expression. I can be tell you if you are married, if you are the
like spaghetti, and if you are the good witch, or the bad witch. I am
good to find the wife for people, except the Luigi, who is to be much
too ugly.

I am to be sitting on the edge of my throne,
The Princess Penny Century. (Please to call me Penny.)
messages.raw:
PRINCESS PENNY CENTURY

I am still to not be the understand. I was of the idea I was to be helping of the childrens. Now you are saying you are to be giving me the moneys? And then you say you are in Switzerland? I am an educationed bambina, Dottore. I am know that the children in Switzerland are to be white and fat, and eat of the chocolate. Their clothes are surely stained with the chocolate, but their very rich parents own their own laundroments, as they are to be making fashion watches and yodel records. You see? I am a funny!

I am still the interested in doing the business if it is of benefit to my peoples. Please to send me your picture so I may determine your trustworthiness. I know my faces, Dottore. I can see the deceit in the eyes. I am have been educated in philonomy, the extensive study of facial expression. I can be tell you if you are married, if you are the like spaghetti, and if you are the good witch, or the bad witch. I am good to find the wife for people, except the Luigi, who is to be much too ugly.

I am to be sitting on the edge of my throne,
The Princess Penny Century. (Please to call me Penny.)

messages.subject: Re: SWISS AFFIDAVIT
messages.body:
Thank-a you for the AFFIDAVID.

But there is-a mistakes. Our-a address is not "3 Paper Avenue
Toadstools Ninetedo Island". The name-a de city is "Toadstool" and the
island is called "Nintendo" not-a "Ninetedo". Can you correct-a dis as
soon asa possibele ?

Also do nota forget to send CERFITICATE OF DECREPIT so I can-a
contact "security company". We must-a not waste too much-a time, as
time isa the moneys, as we say-a.

I ama glad you are talking-a to de princess. She seems-a interested,
yea ? As we say-a, "the more, the marrier". I talked-a to her today and
she was-a commenting on how well this isa all-a going. I invited her
toa dinner so we can-a discuss de finalitation. But it all depend-a on
your-a work.

messages.body:
Il Dottore!  Boniface!

I am happy to be hearing from you. I am saddended that I am to be
advised not to be the working on the moneys. I was being reminded that
I cannot count past my toes. HA! I am still funny, no? I have the man
for you. He is my Royal Treasurer, Senor Vincent Muscaria. He emails at
muscaria@xxxxxxxxxxxxx. He be email to you the soon.

It is to be true that every August I am kidnapped by the "Koopa," as
part of Festival de Linguini. He take me to The Tower for mudwrap,
manicure, and Macaroni. I must ready myself for the pressing of the
olives. Only my feet will do, as they are several times larger than
most of the ladies here.

Arrivacini, Il Dottore, and good fortune for us both.

-- 
Most Very Sincerely Yours
Princess Penny Century
messages.raw:
PRINCESS PENNY CENTURY

Il Dottore! Boniface!

I am happy to be hearing from you. I am saddended that I am to be advised not to be the working on the moneys. I was being reminded that I cannot count past my toes. HA! I am still funny, no? I have the man for you. He is my Royal Treasurer, Senor Vincent Muscaria. He emails at muscaria@xxxxxxxxxxxxx. He be email to you the soon.

It is to be true that every August I am kidnapped by the "Koopa," as part of Festival de Linguini. He take me to The Tower for mudwrap, manicure, and Macaroni. I must ready myself for the pressing of the olives. Only my feet will do, as they are several times larger than most of the ladies here.

Arrivacini, Il Dottore, and good fortune for us both. --
Most Very Sincerely Yours
Princess Penny Century

messages.subject: Thank-a you
messages.body:
Dear Mr. OXBI

Thank-a you for proofs. It isa too bad a picture of de trunk was not
availabile, but I guess I will-a see it for myaself !

Unfortunateye, I cannot-a give you detail right-a now for SWAZERLAND.
As youa know, I work for this plumbery, which isa me and my brother,
Mario. But I am alone because Mario isa at "Koopa Resort", and has not
yet-a come back. He isa off to save de princess, who wasa kidnapped for
de FESTIVAL DE LINGUINI. I can-a not leave right-a now because we are
right in de middle of a goomba migartione. It is hard-a work. I have
been knee-a-deep in goombas every day. I have-a tooth marks on elbows.
Nasty creaturre, they are.

I must-a get my friend Toad (that isa what we call him) to re-place me.
If Toad says-a yea, then I will-a buy tickets as soon as possibele. But
you have toa realize I can nota drop work just likea that, in our-a
bussiest period.

Austrian Air

Austrian Air

messages.body:
Dear EZE,

Yes, I have-a bought ticket to SWAZERLAND. Expensive-a stuff ! I am to
be leaving on dis-a saturnday.

Please-a trust Mr. Muscaria, he isa trusted advisor. Together we can-a
lead-a dis to success.
messages.raw:
LUIGI MARIO

Date: 8/19/2003 06:06:18 -0500

Dear EZE,

Yes, I have-a bought ticket to SWAZERLAND. Expensive-a stuff ! I am to be leaving on dis-a saturnday.

Please-a trust Mr. Muscaria, he isa trusted advisor. Together we can-a lead-a dis to success.

[NOTE FROM LUIGI : Nigerian friend nota biting with friend Muscaria, yea ? I do not-a unnerstand, since-a when do scammars refuse the sniffs of de monayes ? Oh well, de princess won not be happies, but what can-a you do.]

messages.body:
Dear Mario Luigi,

Call me as soon as you are in switzerland .

I wish you safe journey. But you said you were not aware about the mail from the adviser.

Call me as  you  arrive:234 1 7756524.

Eze
messages.raw:
DR EZE JOHN (dr.ezejohn@koko.com)

Date: 8/19/2003 18:37:12 +0100

Dear Mario Luigi,

Call me as soon as you are in switzerland .

I wish you safe journey. But you said you were not aware about the mail from the adviser.

Call me as you arrive:234 1 7756524.

Eze

messages.subject: Safe journey
messages.body:
Dear Luigi,
I will send the picture by attachment but my computer is down I have to go to business centre to send you this mail, as soon as am ok i will send it, therefore send yours ,I will like to see you and you will equally see metoo.
I wish you safe journey and God bless.
call me as soon as you are in Swiss with this nbr 234 1 7756524. Please beg mr . collins michael to assist you open an account after you have given them handling charges, you take money from the box and open an account. Am sure they will help you .
Dr Eze
messages.raw:
DR EZE JOHN (dr.ezejohn@koko.com)

Date: 8/22/2003 10:56:11 +0100
Subject: Safe journey

Dear Luigi,
I will send the picture by attachment but my computer is down I have to go to business centre to send you this mail, as soon as am ok i will send it, therefore send yours ,I will like to see you and you will equally see metoo. I wish you safe journey and God bless.
call me as soon as you are in Swiss with this nbr 234 1 7756524. Please beg mr . collins michael to assist you open an account after you have given them handling charges, you take money from the box and open an account. Am sure they will help you .
Dr Eze

messages.subject: Please-a response quickly
messages.body:
You have-a nota told-a me about-a anyone coming to pick-a me up. I am
getting-a worried that I will-a miss you for lack ova recognitione.

Could you send-a me dis today as I ama leaving very, very early
tomorrow-a morning.
messages.raw:
LUIGI MARIO

Date: 8/22/2003 11:27:52 -0500
To: "Credit Swiss off-shore bank"
Subject: Please-a response quickly

You have-a nota told-a me about-a anyone coming to pick-a me up. I am getting-a worried that I will-a miss you for lack ova recognitione.

Could you send-a me dis today as I ama leaving very, very early tomorrow-a morning.

messages.body:
It will-a be nice to be outav de pipes for a while. My good-a friend
Toad will take-a goud care of de business while I ama away.

It isa too bad that you-a can not send right-a now. I am making my-a
suited cases. If you have-a emails to send, send-a today.

Arrivederci ! Itterasshai !

-- 
Mario Mario and Luigi Mario
Mario Brothers Plumbery Inc.
3 Paper Av., Toadstool
Nintendo Island
